text: Donna Lynn Dixon (born July 20, 1957) is an American actress. She was named Miss Virginia USA in 1976 and Miss District of Columbia World in 1977. She competed in both Miss USA 1976 and Miss World USA 1977. Dixon played Allison Hayes in the NBC drama Berringer's. She co-starred with Tom Hanks in the early 1980s situation comedy Bosom Buddies, playing Sonny Lumet. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American models Category:Actors from Alexandria, Virginia Category:Actors from Washington, D.C.
title: Donna Dixon
